column4: OMFG! this is off topic but has to be told. i just went to the cigaret automat and on the way there were two women talking about Borat. One said something like: "Borat this nazi ... blabla ... establishment of right-wing extremism through the media ... balbla ..." WTF? How stupid can one be? Passing them I said: "I always said it: that anti-Semitic jews and nazi-communists are the root of all evil!" The most sad about that were their faces who to
We have a whole channel for it :)
so i know there is this channel the next time, but i had to tell this^^
